Divine Protection.quote: "The Lord is my shepherd, I shall not want." (Psalm 23:1)

Divine Providence.quote: "And We will surely test you with something of fear and hunger and a loss of wealth and lives and fruits, but give good tidings to the patient." (Quran 2:155)

Divine Healing.quote: "I am the Lord who heals you." (Exodus 15:26)

Divine Guidance.quote: "I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go; I will counsel you with my eye upon you." (Psalm 32:8)

Divine Compassion.quote: "The Lord is gracious and merciful, slow to anger and abounding in steadfast love." (Psalm 145:8)

Divine Nurturing.quote: "As a mother comforts her child, so will I comfort you." (Isaiah 66:13)

Divine Support.quote: "Cast your burden on the Lord, and he will sustain you." (Psalm 55:22)

Divine Attention.quote: "Are not five sparrows sold for two pennies? Yet not one of them is forgotten by God." (Luke 12:6)

Divine Grace.quote: "My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness." (2 Corinthians 12:9)

Divine Presence.quote: "I am with you always, to the end of the age." (Matthew 28:20)

Divine Safety.quote: "He who dwells in the shelter of the Most High will abide in the shadow of the Almighty." (Psalm 91:1)

Divine Watchfulness.quote: "Behold, he who keeps Israel will neither slumber nor sleep." (Psalm 121:4)

Divine Assistance.quote: "God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble." (Psalm 46:1)

Divine Shelter.quote: "Under His wings you will find refuge." (Psalm 91:4)

Divine Comfort.quote: "Blessed are those who mourn, for they shall be comforted." (Matthew 5:4)

Divine Love.quote: "I have loved you with an everlasting love." (Jeremiah 31:3)

Divine Sustenance.quote: "Look at the birds of the air: they neither sow nor reap nor gather into barns, and yet your heavenly Father feeds them." (Matthew 6:26)

Divine Mercy.quote: "The steadfast love of the Lord never ceases; his mercies never come to an end." (Lamentations 3:22)

Divine Defense.quote: "The Lord is my rock and my fortress and my deliverer." (Psalm 18:2)

Divine Preservation.quote: "The Lord will keep you from all evil; he will keep your life." (Psalm 121:7)

Divine Restoration.quote: "I will restore to you the years that the swarming locust has eaten." (Joel 2:25)

Divine Aid.quote: "Fear not, for I am with you; be not dismayed, for I am your God; I will strengthen you, I will help you." (Isaiah 41:10)

Divine Blessing.quote: "The Lord bless you and keep you; the Lord make his face to shine upon you and be gracious to you." (Numbers 6:24-25)

Divine Guardianship.quote: "For he will command his angels concerning you to guard you in all your ways." (Psalm 91:11)

Divine Response.quote: "Before they call I will answer; while they are yet speaking I will hear." (Isaiah 65:24)
